Class RegistrationView

java.lang.Object
View.RegistrationView
public class RegistrationView extends Object
Provides static methods to display information related to Registration entities, which represent HDB officer registrations for project assignments.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    RegistrationView()
     

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static void
    displayRegistration(Registration registration)
    Displays the details of a single registration, including the registration ID, officer's NRIC and name, associated project, and registration status.
    static void
    displayRegistrations(List<Registration> registrations)
    Displays a list of registrations by invoking displayRegistration(Registration) on each registration in the list.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • displayRegistration

      public static void displayRegistration(Registration registration)
      Displays the details of a single registration, including the registration ID, officer's NRIC and name, associated project, and registration status.
      Parameters:
      registration - the registration to display

    • displayRegistrations

      public static void displayRegistrations(List<Registration> registrations)
      Displays a list of registrations by invoking displayRegistration(Registration) on each registration in the list.
      Parameters:
      registrations - the list of registrations to display
